1.title: The Pact

episode of.title: I Escaped: Real Prison Breaks (TV Series 2011– )

1.plot: On March 16 2001, two convicted killers mail themselves to freedom. William Davis and Douglas Gray, both serving life sentences in a Springtown, Oklahoma prison, use their privileged jobs making road signs in the workshop to plan an ingenious escape.

2.title: The Poster Caper

episode of.title: I Escaped: Real Prison Breaks (TV Series 2011– )

2.plot: At the Martin Treatment Center, sex offender Stephen Whitsett convinced his friend to fly him to a new life. At the Union Country Jail in downtown Elizabeth, New Jersey, Otis Blunt and Jose Espinosa borrowed their escape plan from a movie and busted out.

3.title: Runaway Chuck

episode of.title: I Escaped: Real Prison Breaks (TV Series 2011– )

3.plot: Serving a life sentence for rape and murder in Oklahoma prison, James Thomas escapes and takes others along for the ride. At the Harris County Jail, Charles Thompson, on death row for two murders, breaks out of prison by simply walking out the front door.

4.title: Love on the Run

episode of.title: I Escaped: Real Prison Breaks (TV Series 2011– )

4.plot: Convicted killer Roy Townsend escapes from a prison in Arizona; Roger Nordling breaks out of jail and heads to Las Vegas with his girlfriend.

5.title: Lovelorn and Airborne

episode of.title: I Escaped: Real Prison Breaks (TV Series 2011– )

5.plot: Anti-abortionist Clayton Waagner busts out of Dewitt County Jail and declares a Holy war against abortion clinics across America. And, armed robber Jesse Glenn Smith convinces jailhouse groupie Joyce Maddox to hijack a helicopter and fly him to freedom.

6.title: The Torturer

episode of.title: I Escaped: Real Prison Breaks (TV Series 2011– )

6.plot: Staring down a life sentence without parole in an Oregon prison, convicted killer Lee Knoch cuts his way out of prison and sprints to freedom. At a Virginia jail, Christopher Glover, steals a key for his handcuffs and attempts to disappear into thin air.

7.title: The Escapist

episode of.title: I Escaped: Real Prison Breaks (TV Series 2011– )

7.plot: Desperate to be with his daughter, Kentucky armed robber, Anthony "Tony" Artrip, escapes from 3 high-security prisons and soon after holds up 35 banks at gunpoint. Artrip's ability to stay one step ahead of law enforcement proves frustrating to police.

8.title: A Fugitive Among Us

episode of.title: I Escaped: Real Prison Breaks (TV Series 2011– )

8.plot: Killers Sebastian Eccleston and Daniel Mitchem face a potentially fatal 70-foot drop to break out of a detention center in New Mexico. And, Linda Darby, who killed and torched her husband's body, escapes from an Indiana prison by hopping a fence.

9.title: Trooper Tragedy

episode of.title: I Escaped: Real Prison Breaks (TV Series 2011– )

9.plot: A high octane drama documentary. Claude Dennis, 35, is serving 50 years to life in the Oklahoma State Prison. Escaping the prison with armed robber Michael Lancaster, the duo finds themselves in standoff against state troopers with a bloody end.

10.title: Gone to the Dogs

episode of.title: I Escaped: Real Prison Breaks (TV Series 2011– )

10.plot: Prison volunteer and Dog Program Supervisor, Toby Young, describes how her relationship with convicted murderer John Maynard grew to the point that she would help him escape from Lansing Correctional Facility in 2006.

11.title: Love Behind Bars

episode of.title: I Escaped: Real Prison Breaks (TV Series 2011– )

11.plot: Cuban refuge, Orlando Boquete, 30, is serving 50 years in Florida's Glades Correctional Institution for attempted sexual battery and burglary that he swears he didn't commit. Teaming up with fellow inmate, George Wright, the duo risks everything.

12.title: Love & Loyalty

episode of.title: I Escaped: Real Prison Breaks (TV Series 2011– )

12.plot: Billy Fitzmorris fakes an injury and breaks out from a hospital, embarking on a reign of terror that lasts eight hours. And, violent offender Jay Sigler escapes from a prison in Miami -- with the help of his mother driving the getaway car.

imdb.title: I Escaped: Real Prison Breaks
plot: Recounts incredible true stories of some of the greatest prison escapes in history.::Anonymous
